title: 终于到了世界上最好的娱乐园

conversations.english: I’m so excited! We are finally here!Six Flags Magic Mountain! This is the best amusement park in the world!
conversations.chinese: 我很激动。我们终于到了。六旗山。这是世界上最好的娱乐园。
conversations.reply_english: Alright, settle down now, you’re gonna give yourself a heart attack.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，平静下。这样你的心脏会受不了。

conversations.english: I know you're sleepy and I hate to bother you, but I think you're late for work.
conversations.chinese: 我知道你很困，不过很抱歉，我想你要迟到了。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, no. I forgot to turn the alarm clock on!

title: 我带你逛街给你买条新裙子

conversations.english: What do you think about this store? I heard it’s a posh store that’s only got branches in big cities.
conversations.chinese: 你觉得这家店怎么样？我听说这是家一流的精品店，只在大城市开分店。
conversations.reply_english: I love this store. The only problem is that it’s extremely expensive.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢它！唯一的问题就是价格太贵了。

conversations.reply_english: I'm just in the mood to act goofy.

title: 我们获得夏威夷七日游的免费票

conversations.english: I really don't know how to break this to you, but it’s eating me alive!
conversations.chinese: 我实在不知道怎么跟你说这件事，但是它快要把我生吞活剥！
conversations.reply_english: Just tell the truth. I won’t take it personally.
conversations.reply_chinese: 告诉我事实。我不会看得太重的。

title: 竞标真的很好玩The auction is a blast

conversations.english: But the auction is a blast! And I haven't even told you the best part yet!
conversations.chinese: 但竞标真的很好玩耶！而且我还没跟你说最棒的部分呢！
conversations.reply_english: I don't care what the best part is. Whatever you say won't change my mind. I'm not buying anything!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我才不在乎什么棒不棒呢。不管你说什么都不会动摇我的想法。我绝不会买任何东西的

conversations.english: This is today’s schedule. At eight thirtyAM, conference with the department managers. At 9 o’clock, live for the workshop where you’ll award prizes to the stafffor presentatives.
conversations.chinese: 这是今天的日程表。早上8点半，和部门经理开会。9点钟，专题讨论会，给那些员工代表颁奖。
conversations.reply_english: That’s great. What are the prizes?

title: 我买彩票中了一百万元

conversations.english: You won one million yuan in a lottery. What will you say?
conversations.chinese: 你买彩票中了一百万元。想说点什么吗？
conversations.reply_english: I don't know. I'm too excited to say a word.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不知道。我太兴奋了，一句话也说不出。

title: 你妈妈有生气吗Is your mom mad

conversations.english: Brooke, are you still mad? Is your mom mad?
conversations.chinese: 布鲁克，你还在气吗，你妈妈有生气吗？
conversations.reply_english: No...mom said that we'll have the wedding at home on the 2nd. So let's hope your mom is right about that being a lucky day...
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有...妈妈说我们二号在家里结婚。你妈妈说过那天是良辰吉日，希望她没说错。

title: 你是说现在结婚You mean get married now

conversations.english: Did everyone fill out their entry permits?
conversations.chinese: 每个人都填好入境卡了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. The videographer has already started filming my parents trying to speak English with the flight attendants.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对。录像师已经开始在拍我父母努力跟空服员讲英文的样子了。

title: 这下子可有惊喜等着他回来了

conversations.english: Does Mr. Schmidt know he's going to become a father?
conversations.chinese: 史先生知道他要当爸爸了吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, and I have no way of getting ahold of him! There's no phone where he's at!
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，我没办法联络到他！他那个地方没有电话！

title: 我把孕妇装都带来了Maternity clothes

conversations.english: Kim! I'm here! I brought all my old maternity clothes plus Dave and Alice's baby clothes!
conversations.chinese: 阿金！我来了！我把所有的孕妇装都带来了，还有大维跟爱莉丝的婴儿服！
conversations.reply_english: It's a little early for those, isn't it? I still have eight months to go...
conversations.reply_chinese: 这稍嫌太早了吧？我还有八个月才……

conversations.reply_english: Many of the slower dances are danced to the lyrics of tragedies. He meant that you turned it into a comedy.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很多较慢的舞蹈都是跟着悲剧的歌词跳。他是说你把它变成了一出喜剧.

title: 我们在新公寓的第一晚

conversations.english: Cheers! To our first night in our new apartment.
conversations.chinese: 干杯！敬我们在新公寓的第一晚。
conversations.reply_english: It's so quiet. I'm not really used to it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好安静喔。我还真不习惯。

conversations.english: You seem to be in the seventh heaven. What's put you on?
conversations.chinese: 你看起来非常高兴，有什么喜事？
conversations.reply_english: Sarah and I could see eye to eye with each other.
